name: Diablo II: Lord of Destruction
description:
Diablo II: Lord of Destruction is an action-RPG game developed by Blizzard North. It came out on 24-06-2001. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Diablo II: Lord of Destruction on PC.
It was produced by Kenneth Williams and Matthew Householder. It was directed by Tyler Thompson. It was scored by Matt Uelmen.
